      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMutationRequest()
      the authority handles the zone's waiting queues and gives her response for mutations in the waiting queues
      void addMutationRequest(double minimalTrustLevel)
      the authority handles the zone's waiting queues and gives her response for mutations in the waiting queues
      double calculateAchievementDegree(MutableThing thing)
      calculates the achievement degree of a mutation
      int calculateActualResourceConsumption(int estimatedResourceConsumption)
      calculates the real resource consumption of a mutablething for a mutation
      double calculateImpact(MutableThing thing)
      calculates the impact of a MutableThing
      private double calculateMutationResult(int thingId)
      calculate the mutationresult component of cooperativeness for a mutablething
      double calculateNeed(MutableThing thing)
      calculates the need component for a MutableThing
      private double calculateResource(int thingId)
      calculates the resource component of the trustlevel of a mutablething
      double calculateTrustLevel()
      calculate MutableThing trustLevel using MutationLog calls MutationLog's methods getDeviantLogs() and getNonDeviantLogs calls TrustHistory's method addTrustLevelHistory calls MutableThing's method updateMutableThingTrustLevel
      int getid() 
      java.lang.String getName() 
      void handleMutationRequest()
      authority handles MutableThing's mutation request if mutation allowed return true else return false also manages the execution queue with the execution duration of each mutation and removes mutations from the execution queue when they are done and restores zone's common resources and calls updateImpact method to update the impact of a MutableThing each time a MutableThing's mutation has an extra delay and increments the zone's total number of delayed mutations
      void updateImpact(MutableThing thing, int impact)
      calls MutableThing addImpact method to increment the number of delayed mutations caused by a MutableThing
      void updateNeed(MutableThing thing, java.util.ArrayList<Constraint> previousState, java.util.ArrayList<Constraint> actualState)
      updates the need of a MutableThing each time he does a mutation that decrements the working level of the zone in which he is

      • getid

        public int getid()

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        authority's name

      • handleMutationRequest

        public void handleMutationRequest()
                           throws java.io.IOException
        authority handles MutableThing's mutation request if mutation allowed return true else return false also manages the execution queue with the execution duration of each mutation and removes mutations from the execution queue when they are done and restores zone's common resources and calls updateImpact method to update the impact of a MutableThing each time a MutableThing's mutation has an extra delay and increments the zone's total number of delayed mutations
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • addMutationRequest

        public void addMutationRequest()
                        throws java.io.IOException
        the authority handles the zone's waiting queues and gives her response for mutations in the waiting queues
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • calculateTrustLevel

        public double calculateTrustLevel()
                           throws java.io.IOException
        calculate MutableThing trustLevel using MutationLog calls MutationLog's methods getDeviantLogs() and getNonDeviantLogs calls TrustHistory's method addTrustLevelHistory calls MutableThing's method updateMutableThingTrustLevel
        Returns:
        trustlevel
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
